goal_descEN: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
target_descEN: Mobilize and significantly increase financial resources from all sources to conserve and sustainably use biodiversity and ecosystems
indicator_descEN: (a) Official development assistance on conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity; and (b) revenue generated and finance mobilized from biodiversity-relevant economic instruments
